title: 登不进游戏
author: yu5862@126.com
txt_content: 我登入的时候出现这个怎么回事？     Sorry，but we couldn it connect to our servers.Please make sure that you are oline and that Minecraft is not blocked

replies.author: eruw111
replies.txt_content: 应该是你的网络问题或者是文件的问题，试试重新下载一次。

replies.author: REN0011
replies.txt_content: 你家网有问题，给我最佳
